segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to use the copy machine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to pay to use the machine ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you will have to pay to use it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It costs ten cents a copy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Am I limited to a certain number of copies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can copy as much as you ’ d like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you show me how to use the copier ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The instructions for the copier are posted on it .
segments.speaker: S1
